descriptor.name: Kraft Seeds Gardening Tool Kit 2pcs
descriptor.short_desc:
Kraft Seeds Gardening Tool Kit - 2 Pcs (Pruner, Scissor) | Garden Tools Kit for Home Garden | Agriculture Tools for Terrace Gardening | Gardening Accessories With Scissors | Pruners for Garden Plants


About this item
Material: The pruners are made of Export-quality stainless steel and have precision-ground blades for a sharp edge. Scissors are made of stainless steel. Metal parts are black powder coated for corrosion and rust protection.
Components: The package contains 1 Pruner cutter and 1 Scissor.
Comfortable Grip: Essential gardening tools for home use, heavy-duty, and professional use with ergonomic handles for planting applications. These gardening tools are specially designed for comfortable use with a better grip.
Benefits: Kraft Seeds gardening tool kit save your time significantly since they are effective and can provide enhanced productivity while doing garden activities! easy to use, these tools are portable with long life to provide top-notch garden experience!
Use Case: These tools for home gardeners are designed to make gardening easy, and you can get the real experience of gardening with the right tools in your hand. The pruners can cut flower pedicel, plant stems, potted plants, fruit branches, and more. The scissor is used to cut the plant stem and can be used for other household purposes.

descriptor.name: Colgate Strong Teeth 400
descriptor.short_desc:
Colgate Strong Teeth, 300g with Free Toothbrush, India’s No: 1 Toothpaste Brand, Calcium-boost for 2X Stronger Teeth, Prevents cavities, Whitens Teeth, Freshens Breat

About this item
COLGATE STRONG TEETH is India’s no.1 toothpaste for stronger teeth for you and your family. As per Kantar Worldpanel Apr '23 report, it's the No.1 penetrated toothpaste in India, and has the highest volume share within the Toothpastes category.
NOURISHED Teeth are important as our teeth are losing calcium every day we eat sugary or junk food.
COLGATE STRONG TEETH NOURISHES teeth by boosting the process of natural calcium reabsorption from the saliva.
NOURISHED TEETH are 2X STRONGER with COLGATE STRONG TEETH's unique Calcium Boost + Arginine Formula.
STRENGTHENS TEETH, PREVENTS CAVITIES, Whitens Teeth and Freshens Breath.
RECOMMENDED USAGE: Brush twice a day for 2 minutes each time.
100% VEGAN, Gluten-Free and responsibly made.

descriptor.name: Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel 50
descriptor.short_desc:
Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel | Glowing, Moisturizing, Makeup Primer | Made with 99.9% Pure Aloe Vera & Turmeric Extract | Refreshing Hydration, All Skin Types


About this item
# DETOXIFIES : This small jar of aloe helps pull out all kinds of toxic elements present in the skin. It, in turn, helps your skin glow and shine without any visible skin issues.
# HERBAL TREAT FOR YOUR SKIN : Enriched with the goodness of aloe vera extracts, and turmeric, this absolutely soothing gel enhances the skin quality, leaving it with a youthful glow.
# A SOLUTION TO SEVERAL SKIN PROBLEMS : Aloe vera and turmeric extracts help fight skin problems like tan, pigmentation, acne, pimple, rosacea, skin infections, dark spots, and sunburns.
# PRIMES YOUR SKIN : Magic Potion also works as a primer that acts like a layer of protection between your skin and the makeup you apply.
# PURE AND CHEMICAL FREE : It is purely Ayurvedic and organic with ZERO synthetics, parabens, Sulfates or added preservatives. This gel is non-sticky, and has a matte finish. Compared to other aloe vera gel based products, this gel gives a smoother finish.
# SUITS ALL SKIN TYPES : Applying it onto clean dry skin, as a moisturizer or hydrating gel will help maintain the quality of your skin.
descriptor.long_desc:
Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel | Glowing, Moisturizing, Makeup Primer | Made with 99.9% Pure Aloe Vera & Turmeric Extract | Refreshing Hydration, All Skin Types


About this item
# DETOXIFIES : This small jar of aloe helps pull out all kinds of toxic elements present in the skin. It, in turn, helps your skin glow and shine without any visible skin issues.
# HERBAL TREAT FOR YOUR SKIN : Enriched with the goodness of aloe vera extracts, and turmeric, this absolutely soothing gel enhances the skin quality, leaving it with a youthful glow.
# A SOLUTION TO SEVERAL SKIN PROBLEMS : Aloe vera and turmeric extracts help fight skin problems like tan, pigmentation, acne, pimple, rosacea, skin infections, dark spots, and sunburns.
# PRIMES YOUR SKIN : Magic Potion also works as a primer that acts like a layer of protection between your skin and the makeup you apply.
# PURE AND CHEMICAL FREE : It is purely Ayurvedic and organic with ZERO synthetics, parabens, Sulfates or added preservatives. This gel is non-sticky, and has a matte finish. Compared to other aloe vera gel based products, this gel gives a smoother finish.
# SUITS ALL SKIN TYPES : Applying it onto clean dry skin, as a moisturizer or hydrating gel will help maintain the quality of your skin.

descriptor.name: Royal chin pet care 1 pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Complete feed for dogs - For adult large breed dogs (from 26 to 44 kg) - From 15 months to 5 years old.

The nutritional requirements of a larger breed dog versus a smaller breed dog vary greatly, therefore it is essential you feed a balanced diet according to size and other particular sensitivities. ROYAL CANIN® Max

Adult food is specially formulated with your dog's nutritional needs in mind. This food is suitable for large dogs aged 15 months and over - with an adult weight ranging between 26-44kg. For large dogs, bones and joints can be a particular sensitivity, therefore maintaining your dog's joint health is crucial for the wear and tear it may face due to its size. ROYAL CANIN® Maxi Adult food will help maintain an ideal weight that your dog can comfortably support. ROYAL CANIN® Maxi dog food contains an exclusive formula to help maintain your dog's digestive health. What's more, it's enriched with omega-3 fatty acids (EPA and DHA), ROYAL CANIN® Maxi adult dog food also helps to support and maintain your dog's skin by keeping it healthy and nourished.
descriptor.long_desc:
Complete feed for dogs - For adult large breed dogs (from 26 to 44 kg) - From 15 months to 5 years old.

The nutritional requirements of a larger breed dog versus a smaller breed dog vary greatly, therefore it is essential you feed a balanced diet according to size and other particular sensitivities. ROYAL CANIN® Max

Adult food is specially formulated with your dog's nutritional needs in mind. This food is suitable for large dogs aged 15 months and over - with an adult weight ranging between 26-44kg. For large dogs, bones and joints can be a particular sensitivity, therefore maintaining your dog's joint health is crucial for the wear and tear it may face due to its size. ROYAL CANIN® Maxi Adult food will help maintain an ideal weight that your dog can comfortably support. ROYAL CANIN® Maxi dog food contains an exclusive formula to help maintain your dog's digestive health. What's more, it's enriched with omega-3 fatty acids (EPA and DHA), ROYAL CANIN® Maxi adult dog food also helps to support and maintain your dog's skin by keeping it healthy and nourished.

descriptor.name: WOW Skin Science Rosemary Oil Biotin Hair Growth Kit 100
descriptor.short_desc:
WOW Skin Science Rosemary Oil & Biotin Hair Growth Kit - Complete Care for Breakage-Prone Hair - Oil, Shampoo, Conditioner - 700ml

 

About this item
Hair growth hair care regime: Nourish, cleanse and protect your brittle, breakage-prone hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Hair Care Kit. The kit offers you a three-step hair care regime to repair, strengthen and protect your hair against breakage and hair loss. The kit has WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Hair Oil, Shampoo and Conditioner.
Stimulates scalp and roots: As step 1, apply WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Hair Oil. It is a lightweight, fast-absorb, hair-growth hair oil infused with rosemary oil, biotin and hibiscus extracts that stimulates your sluggish scalp and helps to promote hair growth. This anti hair fall hair oil helps to boost circulation to the roots, nourishes the scalp to help promote hair growth and enhance hair density.
Cleanses and strengthens hair: As step 2, wash your hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Shampoo. It is infused with antioxidant rich rosemary oil, biotin and moringa oil that strengthen roots to reduce hair fall and boost hair growth. It is a gentle anti-hair fall shampoo that cleanses your scalp and hair thoroughly. It helps to remove build-up without stripping off moisture from strands. Leaves hair looking healthy, lush, lustrous and voluminous.
Protects and detangles hair: As step 3, condition your strands with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Conditioner. It is a softening hair conditioner infused with antioxidant rich rosemary oil, biotin and moringa oil. This anti-hair loss, creamy conditioner helps to moisturize and smoothen each strand. This vitamin enriched hair strengthening conditioner makes hair glossy and adds bounce. It restores softness and shine to dull, brittle hair.
Made With Natural Actives That Promote Hair Growth: This anti hair fall hair care kit has natural ingredients like rosemary oil, biotin, hibiscus extract and moringa oil. Rosemary extract present in the oil is rich in manganese, carnosol acid and vitamin C. It helps to boost stimulation to the roots, soothe itchy scalp and prevent hair loss. Biotin, also called vitamin H, nourishes roots, reduces damage and strengthens strands.
Benefits of Using WOW Skin Science Products: Well, they have none of those harmful chemicals like parabens, mineral oil, silicones, sulphate, artificial fragrance or color. The products have a high concentration of activated natural and are pH balanced. They are dermatologically tested.
Fight hair fall with rosemary and biotin Get lustrous, voluminous hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Kit. It is an easy-to-use, 3-step, hair growth boosting hair care regime to add volume and shine to thin, breakage-prone hair.

descriptor.name: Egg 1pc
descriptor.short_desc: An egg is an organic vessel grown by an animal to carry a possibly fertilized egg cell and to incubate from it an embryo within the egg until the embryo has become an animal fetus that can survive on its own, at which point the animal hatches.
descriptor.long_desc: An egg is an organic vessel grown by an animal to carry a possibly fertilized egg cell and to incubate from it an embryo within the egg until the embryo has become an animal fetus that can survive on its own, at which point the animal hatches.

descriptor.name: ORANGE KADHA Ayurvedic Kadha for Immunity Cold Cough Sore Throat  Congestion 1pc
descriptor.short_desc:
Orange Kadha mix is a contemporary ayurvedic recipe made from Ayush Kwath Ingredients like It consists of Orange pulp, Giloy (Tinospora Cordidolia), Tulsi (Basil), Haldi (Turmeric), Daalchini (Cinnamon), Kaali Ilaichee (Black cardamom), Dry Ginger Powder (Soth), Pudina (Mint), Pudina (Mint), Kaali Mirch (Black pepper), Laung (Cloves), Ajwain (Carom seeds), Hing (Asafoetida), Methi (Fenugreek), Sendha Namak (Rock salt).
	Provides relief from cough, cold, running nose
	Detoxifies the body
	Works as a stress buster
	Helps in weight loss
	Just add warm water to the mix and sip the goodness of the powerful Kadha. You can add Honey or Jaggery for enhancing taste and benefits.
descriptor.long_desc:
• Orange Kadha mix is a contemporary ayurvedic recipe made from Ayush Kwath Ingredients like It consists of Orange pulp, Giloy (Tinospora Cordidolia), Tulsi (Basil), Haldi (Turmeric), Daalchini (Cinnamon), Kaali Ilaichee (Black cardamom), Dry Ginger Powder (Soth), Pudina (Mint), Pudina (Mint), Kaali Mirch (Black pepper), Laung (Cloves), Ajwain (Carom seeds), Hing (Asafoetida), Methi (Fenugreek), Sendha Namak (Rock salt).
  • Provides relief from cough, cold, running nose
  • Detoxifies the body
  • Works as a stress buster
  • Helps in weight loss
  • Just add warm water to the mix and sip the goodness of the powerful Kadha. You can add Honey or Jaggery for enhancing taste and benefits.

descriptor.name: Swaarnim Diabetes Care 1 pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Today, 77 million adults are living with diabetes (diabetes mellitus) in India. And it’s no surprise that the numbers are predicted to increase to 134 million by 2045.

The sole treatment for diabetes is AYURVEDA. The ayurvedic approach for treatment varies from person to person depending on the severity of the disease. Ayurveda works on a person’s three doshas - The Vata, Pitta, and Kapha which maintains our overall health. We are glad to say that we have seen so many positive results through our treatments by the combination herbs which provides-


	Insulin support to regulate glucose levels
	Better and healthy glucose metabolism.
	Support healthy living.
descriptor.long_desc:
Today, 77 million adults are living with diabetes (diabetes mellitus) in India. And it’s no surprise that the numbers are predicted to increase to 134 million by 2045.

Ayurveda works on a person’s three doshas - The Vata, Pitta, and Kapha which maintains our overall health. We are glad to say that we have seen so many positive results through our treatments by the combination herbs which provides-

  • Insulin support to regulate glucose levels
  • Better and healthy glucose metabolism.
  • Support healthy living.

descriptor.name: Dexolac Special Care Infant Formula Milk Powder for Premature Babies Born Before  weeks Low Birth Weight Less Than Kg 280gm
descriptor.short_desc:
Dexolac Special Care Infant Formula is a powdered milk substitute for premature babies (born before 37 weeks) and low birth weight babies (less than 2.5 kg). It is specially designed for the baby’s overall growth and development
	Dexolac Special care contains nutrients that support catch up growth, brain development, Immunity & digestive health of a premature baby
	It contains Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids (precursors of DHA and ARA), Taurine, Choline, Iron and Iodine for baby’s brain development
	Contains Energy levels of 79 kcal/100ml for catch-up growth. Nucleotides, Lactose, easy to digest Whey proteins and Maltodextrin for digestive health. And 3.4mg/100ml Nucleotides and Vitamin A, C, E, Selenium and Zinc for immune function
	Formulated with Calcium, Phosphorus, Magnesium and Vitamin D to help formation of strong bones
	IMPORTANT NOTICE: Mother’s Milk Is Best For Your Baby
	Developed by Nutricia International Pvt Ltd, a sub-brand of Danone, Dexolac is available in market for the last 30 years providing the best nutrition for infants at their growing stage of life. Dexolac offers a range of specialized infant formula
descriptor.long_desc:
• Dexolac Special Care Infant Formula is a powdered milk substitute for premature babies (born before 37 weeks) and low birth weight babies (less than 2.5 kg). It is specially designed for the baby’s overall growth and development
  • Dexolac Special care contains nutrients that support catch up growth, brain development, Immunity & digestive health of a premature baby
  • It contains Omega 3 and 6 fatty acids (precursors of DHA and ARA), Taurine, Choline, Iron and Iodine for baby’s brain development

descriptor.name: Aloe Vera Gel for Skin and Hair 100gm
descriptor.short_desc: Over the years, Aloe Vera has been a household name when it comes to soothing inflammation and hair woes. Aloe Vera has stood the test of time and is still used in various skin and hair care products. We at Mamaearth have taken the cue and bring to you Aloe Vera Gel that works like magic for both your skin and hair. This pure Aloe Vera Gel penetrates your skin and scalp to nourish & moisturize from deep within. The antibacterial properties present in Aloe Vera Vitamin E prevent itchy scalp and irritated skin. Regular application will promote even skin tone, fight breakouts, and prevent wrinkles on your skin. Regular aloe vera gel uses for hair will keep them shiny, strong, moisturized, and make the scalp healthy and happy. Suitable for all skin and hair types, this Aloe Vera Gel has no harmful chemicals and is free of Toxins, Parabens, and Mineral Oil

descriptor.name: Advance Whey Protein With Vitamins  Minerals 145gm
descriptor.short_desc:
Milk is made of two proteins, casein and whey. Whey protein can be separated from the casein in milk or formed as a by-product of cheese making. Whey protein is considered a complete protein as it contains all 9 essential amino acids. It is low in lactose content.

There are many benefits associated with the consumption of whey protein, and researchers are constantly finding new possible therapeutic properties. Here, we explain what the benefits might be, and look at some of the side effects and potential risks.
descriptor.long_desc:
Milk is made of two proteins, casein and whey. Whey protein can be separated from the casein in milk or formed as a by-product of cheese making. Whey protein is considered a complete protein as it contains all 9 essential amino acids. It is low in lactose content.

There are many benefits associated with the consumption of whey protein, and researchers are constantly finding new possible therapeutic properties. Here, we explain what the benefits might be, and look at some of the side effects and potential risks.

descriptor.name: Crocin Pain Relief Tablet 1 pack
descriptor.short_desc:
Crocin Pain Relief Tablet is a combination of two medicines used in the treatment of headache. It helps relieve headache by blocking the release of certain chemical messengers that causes headache.

Your doctor will advise how much Crocin Pain Relief Tablet you need to take. It can be taken with or without food. You should take the medicine regularly while you do need it and try not to miss doses as it will become less effective. It should be used with caution in people who have any problems with their heart, kidneys, or liver.

Using this medicine may cause sleep problems (insomnia), nervousness, irritation, or restlessness. If you experience any of such side effects that do not go away or worsen, you should let your doctor know. Your doctor may be able to suggest ways of preventing or reducing the symptoms. In general, you should try to use the smallest amount necessary to control your symptoms.

Before using the medicine, you should tell your doctor if you have any other illnesses or disorders. It may also affect, or be affected by, some other medicines you are using so let your doctor know all the other medicines you are taking. Do not consume alcohol when on treatment with this medicine as it may cause excessive sleepiness. Pregnant and breastfeeding women should consult their doctors first before using the medicine.
descriptor.long_desc:
Crocin Pain Relief Tablet is a combination of two medicines used in the treatment of headache. It helps relieve headache by blocking the release of certain chemical messengers that causes headache.

Your doctor will advise how much Crocin Pain Relief Tablet you need to take. It can be taken with or without food. You should take the medicine regularly while you do need it and try not to miss doses as it will become less effective. It should be used with caution in people who have any problems with their heart, kidneys, or liver.

Using this medicine may cause sleep problems (insomnia), nervousness, irritation, or restlessness. If you experience any of such side effects that do not go away or worsen, you should let your doctor know. Your doctor may be able to suggest ways of preventing or reducing the symptoms. In general, you should try to use the smallest amount necessary to control your symptoms.

Before using the medicine, you should tell your doctor if you have any other illnesses or disorders. It may also affect, or be affected by, some other medicines you are using so let your doctor know all the other medicines you are taking. Do not consume alcohol when on treatment with this medicine as it may cause excessive sleepiness. Pregnant and breastfeeding women should consult their doctors first before using the medicine.

descriptor.name: Pahadi honey 1
descriptor.short_desc:
Pahadi Honey is sourced from the wild forests of the Himalayas, ensuring a natural and organic product. Our honey is NMR tested, guaranteeing authenticity and purity, providing you with a high-quality product you can trust
	This high-quality natural raw honey and purest honey comes from the highly coveted Apis CerenaIndica honeybee that is indigenous to Uttrakhand
	With a unique taste and aroma derived from diverse flora in the Himalayan forests, Pahadi Honey is a great natural sweetener for tea, coffee, and other beverages, as well as cooking and baking recipes
	Our honey is sustainably harvested, promoting forest conservation and supporting the livelihoods of local communities. With a long shelf life and convenient packaging, Pahadi Honey is a pantry staple that can be enjoyed throughout the year.
	Our honey is available in a 500g size, providing ample supply for your household or gifting purposes.
descriptor.long_desc:
• Pahadi Honey is sourced from the wild forests of the Himalayas, ensuring a natural and organic product. Our honey is NMR tested, guaranteeing authenticity and purity, providing you with a high-quality product you can trust

  • Our honey is sustainably harvested, promoting forest conservation and supporting the livelihoods of local communities. With a long shelf life and convenient packaging, Pahadi Honey is a pantry staple that can be enjoyed throughout the year.
  • Our honey is available in a 500g size, providing ample supply for your household or gifting purposes.
